headline: Bodacious Broccoli Salad
description: This broccoli salad with bacon and cheese is tossed with a tangy red wine vinegar and mayonnaise dressing. Everyone who tastes this salad loves it!

video.description: See how to make a kicking 5-star broccoli salad.
video.name: Bodacious Broccoli Salad

name: Bodacious Broccoli Salad

recipeInstructions.text: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium-high heat until crisp and evenly browned, 8-10 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate and crumble when cool enough to handle.
Combine bacon, broccoli, cheese, and onion in a large bowl.
Whisk mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, sugar, pepper, salt, and lemon juice together in a small bowl; pour over salad and toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.

This is fabulous! I took this to a family bbq and it paired beautifully with the porterhouse steaks. The guys were surprised and have asked me to bring it again. Alterations & suggestions:
1) make ahead so it can chill and let flavors combine at least 4 to 6 hrs prior to serving.
2) make a little extra of the sauce.
3) I used good basalmic vinegar instead of the red wine vinegar. 
4) I subbed one TBS of honey and Swerve (sugar substitute) for the sugar as three out of five of the guys are diabetic.
5) I subbed plain greek yogurt for half the real mayo for calories and health.
6) I omitted the pepper and added a dash of onion powder instead. 
7) I added two handfuls (about 2/3 cup) of Nature Source Organic Salad Topper (has sunflower seeds, dried cranberries, & pumpkin seeds).
8) Key component was excellent quality broccoli. Got mine from the fresh farm stand so the florets were tender and sweet with perfect crunch.
---Best of luck and enjoy. Hubby wants more so need to procure more broccoli today.

After making this for a few years this is what I do that might help others..
